Articles.Content:
Hello,

recently I installed MechJeb and tried using it. It works well, but once I use it I'm unable to quicksave or return to the KSC. Even with ALT+F5 it won't let me. MechJeb is the only mod I've got on my installation, any solutions?

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Update: I made it back to the space center by clicking the button when it would mean that I would lose some of the flight progress. However, I cannot enter the VAB or launch anything from the launch pad (I get the menu, but when I click launch it doesn't respond). The only thing that works is the kerbonaut recruiting center.
Any solutions? It's rather annoying and I'm unable to do anything.

For other who have this problem:

I was able to solve it by saving my .crafts and saves somewhere else and completely reinstalling KSP.
